intro: Tiliacora australiana, commonly known as the Australian tiliacora, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, climbing stems and opposite, ovate leaves with a smooth surface. It produces small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers that are often followed by small, round berries. Tiliacora australiana is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and along stream banks.
